product_name: Thule Pack'n Pedal Pannier Magnet with Attachment
long_description: The Thule Pack'n Pedal Pannier Magnet with Attachment works as a replacement or extra magnet for Thule Pack 'n Pedal panniers. Rare earth magnet secures lower part of Thule Pack 'n Pedal panniers (panniers sold separately). Part of the patent-pending "vanishing hardware" attachment solution for Thule Pack 'n Pedal Panniers. Works with all Thule Pack 'n Pedal Panniers.
short_description: The Thule Pack'n Pedal Pannier Magnet with Attachment works as a replacement or extra magnet for Thule Pack 'n Pedal panniers.
